ComicInfo.Summary:
You Must Have a Taste for It!: Carlton Beal has a taste for only the most exotic and disgusting food from around the world.
The Mummy in the Iron Mask: Clair is convinced that Phil is the lost heir to a French fortune and forces him to travel to France to claim his inheritance.
Food for Naught!: Two space explorers respond to a distress call.
The Temple of the 7 Stars!: Johnny Peril defeats the Master of the 7 Stars.
